NomaiObject: Clue to convey: Warp transmitters require a warp receiver (context: wait, the warp receiver isnt installed yet!) Excavation Site 1 CLARY: Friends, the White Hole Station's construction was completed today. I cannot wait to jump into the black hole to visit and test it soon! 2 1 FILIX: How exciting, Clary! If the White Hole Station works, Nomai on Brittle Hollow shall never need to live in fear of falling into the black hole again! 3 1 POKE: Wait, Clary! The White Hole Station isn't operational yet! Do not jump into the black hole! 4 3 POKE: A warp transmitter requires a connected warp receiver to function; the White Hole Station's warp transmitter does not yet have a connected warp receiver for it to transport Nomai to! 5 4 CLARY: I owe Filix my deepest gratitude for verbally warning me before I leapt.. Has a site been chosen for the warp receiver yet, Poke? 6 5 POKE: There should be ample space on the surface above the Hanging City. Building the warp receiver there should also provide convenient travel back to the city from the White Hole Station. 7 6 CLARY: In that case, I'm off to install the warp receiver! Afterwards.. I shall finally have my chance to jump into a black hole! BH_H EX1 1 BH_H EX2 6 BH_H EX3 4
